verses.verse: And Joshua <WH3091> rose up early <WH7925> in the morning <WH1242>; and they removed <WH5265> from Shittim <WH7851>, and came <WH935> to the Jordan <WH3383>, he and all the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; and they lodged <WH3885> there before they passed over <WH5674>.
And it came to pass after <WH7097> three <WH7969> days <WH3117>, that the officers <WH7860> went <WH5674> through <WH7130> the midst of the camp <WH4264>;

and they commanded <WH6680> the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559>, When ye see <WH7200> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>, and the priests <WH3548> the Levites <WH3881> bearing <WH5375> it <WH5265>, then ye shall remove from your place <WH4725>, and go <WH1980> after it <WH310>.

Yet there shall be a space <WH7350> between you and it <WH505>, about two thousand cubits <WH520> by measure <WH4060>: come not near <WH7126> unto it <WH3045>, that ye may know the way <WH1870> by which ye must go <WH3212>; for ye have not passed <WH5674> this way <WH1870> heretofore <WH8543>.
And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto the people <WH5971>, Sanctify <WH6942> yourselves <WH4279>; for to-morrow Jehovah <WH3068> will do <WH6213> wonders <WH6381> among you <WH7130>.

And Joshua <WH3091> spake <WH559> unto the priests <WH3548>, saying <WH559>, Take up <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285>, and pass over <WH5674> before <WH6440> the people <WH5971>. And they took up <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285>, and went <WH3212> before <WH6440> the people <WH5971>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Joshua <WH3091>, This day <WH3117> will I begin <WH2490> to magnify <WH1431> thee in the sight <WH5869> of all Israel <WH3478>, that they may know <WH3045> that <WH4872>, as I was with Moses, so I will be with thee.

And thou shalt command <WH6680> the priests <WH3548> that bear <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285>, saying <WH559>, When ye are come <WH935> to the brink <WH7097> of the waters <WH4325> of the Jordan <WH3383>, ye shall stand still <WH5975> in the Jordan <WH3383>.
And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, Come hither <WH5066>, and hear <WH8085> the words <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>.

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559>, Hereby ye shall know <WH3045> that the living <WH2416> God <WH410> is among <WH7130> you <WH3423>, and that he will without fail drive out <WH3423> from before <WH6440> you the Canaanite <WH3669>, and the Hittite <WH2850>, and the Hivite <WH2340>, and the Perizzite <WH6522>, and the Girgashite <WH1622>, and the Amorite <WH567>, and the Jebusite <WH2983>.
Behold <WH727>, the ark of the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH113> of all the earth <WH776> passeth over <WH5674> before <WH6440> you into the Jordan <WH3383>.
Now therefore take <WH3947> you twelve <WH8147> men <WH376> out of the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478>, for every <WH259> tribe <WH7626> a man <WH376>.

And it shall come to pass <WH3709>, when the soles of the feet <WH7272> of the priests <WH3548> that bear <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of Jehovah <WH3068>, the Lord <WH3068> of all the earth <WH776>, shall rest <WH5117> in the waters <WH4325> of the Jordan <WH3383>, that the waters <WH4325> of the Jordan <WH3383> shall be cut off <WH3772>, even the waters <WH4325> that come down <WH3381> from above <WH4605>; and they shall stand <WH5975> in one <WH259> heap <WH5067>.

And it came to pass <WH5971>, when the people removed <WH5265> from their tents <WH168>, to pass over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383>, the priests <WH3548> that bare <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> being before <WH6440> the people <WH5971>;

and when they that bare <WH5375> the ark <WH727> were come <WH935> unto the Jordan <WH3383>, and the feet <WH7272> of the priests <WH3548> that bare <WH5375> the ark <WH727> were dipped <WH2881> in the brink <WH7097> of the water <WH4325> (for the Jordan <WH3383> overfloweth <WH4390> all its banks <WH1415> all the time <WH3117> of harvest <WH7105>,)

that the waters <WH4325> which came down <WH3381> from above <WH4605> stood <WH5975>, and <WH259> rose up <WH6965> in one <WH259> heap <WH5067>, a great <WH3966> way off <WH7368>, at Adam <WH121>, the city <WH5892> that is beside <WH6654> Zarethan <WH6891>; and those that went down <WH3381> toward the sea <WH3220> of the Arabah <WH6160>, even the Salt <WH4417> Sea <WH3220>, were wholly cut off <WH3772>: and the people <WH5971> passed over <WH5674> right against Jericho <WH3405>.

And the priests <WH3548> that bare <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of Jehovah <WH3068> stood <WH5975> firm <WH3559> on dry ground <WH2724> in the midst <WH8432> of the Jordan <WH3383>; and all Israel <WH3478> passed over <WH5674> on dry ground <WH2724>, until all the nation <WH1471> were passed <WH5674> clean <WH8552> over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383>.
